entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:56 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 09:56 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
